verbs.description: arrival of colder weather ushers in kick return season and [ARG1: the bears] [V: are] [ARG2: ready] the nfl put the kickoff on the endangered list this season but special teams coaches banded together to create new rules which judging by the preseason made it a safer play with colder weather we 'll begin to see more kickoff returns the bears are ready to make it an exciting play nfl bears soldier field national football league football weather patriots
